to leave home to make one's way in the world/to leave the life one knows to seek success

sentences.english: March Spring is warm, water chestnut green Mai Dang heart.
sentences.chinese: 又是三月春风暖，荠麦青青荡心扉。

sentences.english: College life may never be this tumultuous, but then again, this is TV.
sentences.chinese: 大学生活本不应该动动荡荡，仅仅体现在荧屏上。

sentences.english: And so I dream of going back to be.
sentences.chinese: 现在还梦想着再去荡一回桦树。

sentences.english: Its blue wes flow in my sweet dreams.
sentences.chinese: 荡着清波从我的梦中流过。

sentences.english: Between Tim green hair, goes podium finishes laughter.
sentences.chinese: 青丝之间添华发，三尺讲台荡笑声。

sentences.english: Its blue waves flow in my sweet dreams.
sentences.chinese: 荡着清波从我的梦中流过。

sentences.english: I like to think some boy's been swinging them.
sentences.chinese: 我总以为有个孩子把白杨“荡“弯了。

sentences.english: As it does so, release the left brake and allow the canopy to surge forward .
sentences.chinese: 果真如此，放开这左煞车并且任这伞向前荡。

sentences.english: The melody still rang in her ears.
sentences.chinese: 那个旋律仍然在她的耳际荡。

sentences.english: The designer has made a mistake which does not let the swing swing.
sentences.chinese: 设计者犯了个错误使得秋千荡不起来了。

sentences.english: Only the first chapter is a true part of Dang.
sentences.chinese: 其首章方是真正的《荡》篇的一部分。

sentences.english: So was I once myself a swinger of birches.
sentences.chinese: 当年，我自己也是“荡桦树“的能手。

sentences.english: Scythes, hips, and the hangman's noose all do it. Why not you?
sentences.chinese: 甩起镰刀扭起臀，夺命绞索荡悠悠，它们都行你也行。

sentences.english: Thy rowers have brought thee into great waters: the east wind hath broken thee in the midst of the seas.
sentences.chinese: 荡桨的已经把你荡到大水之处，东风在海中将你打破。

sentences.english: The point is that "swing" has some interesting swinging effect.
sentences.chinese: 重点是“荡“制造出很有趣的感觉。

sentences.english: One could do worse than be a swinger of birches.
sentences.chinese: 比“荡桦树“更没有意思的事，可有的是。

definition: to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
